net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base

Class EnvironmentDetectorSpringProfileImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractComponent
      • net.sf.mmm.util.component.base.AbstractLoggableComponent
        • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.AbstractEnvironmentDetector
          • net.sf.mmm.util.lang.base.EnvironmentDetectorSpringProfileImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnvironmentDetector

    public class EnvironmentDetectorSpringProfileImpl
extends AbstractEnvironmentDetector
    This is the default implementation of EnvironmentDetector. It is based on spring profiles.
    Since:
    4.0.0
    Author:
    Joerg Hohwiller (hohwille at users.sourceforge.net)

    • Method Detail

      • getEnvironmentType

        public String getEnvironmentType()
        Returns:
        the environment type such as EnvironmentDetector.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE_DEVELOPMENT, EnvironmentDetector.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE_TEST, EnvironmentDetector.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE_ACCEPTANCE, EnvironmentDetector.ENVIRONMENT_TYPE_PRODUCTION, or any other custom kind of environment.

      • getEnvironmentTypeSynchronized

        protected String getEnvironmentTypeSynchronized()
        Returns:
        the environment type with lazy initialization.

      • getEnvironment

        public org.springframework.core.env.Environment getEnvironment()
        Returns:
        the Environment.

      • setEnvironment

        @Inject
public void setEnvironment(org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment)
        Parameters:
        environment - is the Environment to Inject.

      • doInitialize

        protected void doInitialize()
        This method performs the actual initialization. It is called when AbstractComponent.initialize() is invoked for the first time.
        ATTENTION:
        When you override this method from a sub-class you need to do a super.AbstractComponent.doInitialize().
        Overrides:
        doInitialize in class AbstractLoggableComponent

      • logEnvironmentStatus

        protected void logEnvironmentStatus()
        Logs the current environment status information.
        Overrides:
        logEnvironmentStatus in class AbstractEnvironmentDetector

      • detectEnvironmentType

        protected String detectEnvironmentType(String[] names)
        Parameters:
        names - are the names of actual environments or configuration profiles.
        Returns:
        the detected environment.

      • detectEnvironmentType

        protected String detectEnvironmentType(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - is the name of an actual environment or a configuration profile.
        Returns:
        the environment type that has been detected by naming convention, or null if nothing could be detected.
